name: Global-e Cross-Border integration for WooCommerce
author: Global-e Online Ltd.

sections.description:
Grow your international sales quickly and simply in over 200 destinations worldwide

Via our certified integration, merchants can deploy a seamless localized shopping experience on their existing online store and boost their online sales worldwide in a fast and cost-effective manner.

Convert global shoppers with an end-to-end localized experience

Through a single integration, we remove all major obstacles preventing customers from buying cross-border, covering all aspects of the customer journey, including:
* Local pricing and currencies
* Local and alternative payment methods
* Local duty and tax calculation
* Multiple shipping options
* Localized multi-lingual checkout
* Easy return process

Highlights

  • Global-e makes cross-border ecommerce as simple as domestic sales.
  • End-to-end operations – streamlining international logistics including shipping, customs, customer service and returns.
  • Risk management and regulation – eliminating fraud and currency fluctuation risks, managing country restrictions and import processing.
  • Best practices and local market knowledge – unique BI model based on advanced big-data analysis to support your performance KPIs and hit optimal conversion rates.

Features

  • Local Pricing: Let shoppers browse and buy in their local currency; more than 100 supported. Display prices rounded and formatted according to local conventions, adjusted per country. Intelligent pricing – supporting local pricing strategies.
  • Global operations: Streamlined logistics and shipping (outbound and inbound), including address validation. Multiple shipping options – offer shoppers a variety of international shipping methods at competitive rates. Convenient returns portal – transparent and easy returns process; pre-paid returns option.
  • Seamless and risk-free expansion: Zero risk of international fraud and currency fluctuation. Support commercial and regulatory country restrictions, full compliance with distance selling regulation. Simple transactions – offering local transactions in the currency of your choice with simple local settlement. Single and simple integration. No upfront investment. No set-up fees.
  • Localized welcome and checkout: Reduce bounce rates by welcoming your international customers with a localized message, giving them assurance they can buy from you. Enable shoppers to conveniently checkout in their preferred language; available in 26 languages.
  • Local duty and tax calculation and local payment methods: Allow shoppers to pay with their preferred local payment method; over 150 supported including local credit cards, e-payments and open invoice. Prevent unpleasant surprises upon delivery and allow shoppers to view and prepay all duties and taxes at checkout.
